documents.document: #ukedchat Q5 Make it as visual as possible, use of symbols (e.g. comm in print) and modelling of how/when to use it
#ukedchat 2/2 I find that heavy modelling using it during inputs has a very positive outcome. Always praise chn you see using it
#ukedchat Q2 - In Yr1 and R having working displays which have oral rehearsals or prompts on have been used heavily during learning... 1/2
